printed_text: Whenever you encounter a barrier, for the remainder of that encounter this program gets +1 strength for each subroutine on that barrier. Interface → 2[credit]: Break up to 2 barrier subroutines.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever you encounter a barrier, for the remainder of that encounter this program gets +1 strength for each subroutine on that barrier. Interface -> 2 credits: Break up to 2 barrier subroutines.

printed_text: Interface → 2[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength. Whenever you pass a sentry after encountering it, you may trash the top card of your stack. If you do, trash 1 card from the top of R&D for each subroutine on that sentry that resolved during that encounter.
stripped_printed_text: Interface -> 2 credits: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 1 credit: +1 strength. Whenever you pass a sentry after encountering it, you may trash the top card of your stack. If you do, trash 1 card from the top of R&D for each subroutine on that sentry that resolved during that encounter.

flavor: "Even I don't know how or why this one works. I just copied the schematics from a burst broadcast from someplace north of Paxton's Node, where nothing is supposed to be." -Los
printed_text: [click], X[credit]: Derez 1 piece of ice with printed rez cost X[credit] that was rezzed this turn. Use this ability only once per turn.
stripped_printed_text: click, X credits: Derez 1 piece of ice with printed rez cost X credits that was rezzed this turn. Use this ability only once per turn.

printed_text: Whenever you access a card with a trash cost not in Archives and do not trash it, you may reveal it and gain 1[credit].
stripped_printed_text: Whenever you access a card with a trash cost not in Archives and do not trash it, you may reveal it and gain 1 credit.

printed_text: [click], remove an installed program from the game: Search your stack for a non-virus program, shuffle your stack, then install that program, lowering the install cost by the cost of the program removed from the game.
stripped_printed_text: click, remove an installed program from the game: Search your stack for a non-virus program, shuffle your stack, then install that program, lowering the install cost by the cost of the program removed from the game.

flavor: "Who said you can't teach an old breaker new tricks?" -g00ru
printed_text: Install only on an icebreaker. Host icebreaker gains AI and "Interface → Lose [click]: Break 1 subroutine."
stripped_printed_text: Install only on an icebreaker. Host icebreaker gains AI and "Interface -> Lose click: Break 1 subroutine."

printed_text: Install Dedicated Processor on a non-AI icebreaker. Host icebreaker gains "2[credit]: +4 strength."
stripped_printed_text: Install Dedicated Processor on a non-AI icebreaker. Host icebreaker gains "2 credits: +4 strength."

printed_text: The first time each turn you pass a piece of ice after an encounter during which this program fully broke that ice, you may swap it with another installed piece of ice. Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
stripped_printed_text: The first time each turn you pass a piece of ice after an encounter during which this program fully broke that ice, you may swap it with another installed piece of ice. Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 1 credit: +1 strength.

flavor: "You want untraceable funds? I'll lend, as long as you have the ability to pay me back."
printed_text:
When your turn begins, gain 1[credit] if you have fewer than 6[credit].
Whenever you have 0[credit], trash Dadiana Chacon and take 3 meat damage.
stripped_printed_text: When your turn begins, gain 1 credit if you have fewer than 6 credits. Whenever you have 0 credits, trash Dadiana Chacon and take 3 meat damage.

flavor: "I passed through the opalescent curtain only to find a suddenly empty server..."
printed_text: This ice gains "[subroutine] You may install 1 card from HQ." for each rezzed piece of NEXT ice.
stripped_printed_text: This ice gains "Subroutine You may install 1 card from HQ." for each rezzed piece of NEXT ice.

flavor: "They don't need sleep, breaks, overtime, or even O₂. How can we compete with that!?"
printed_text: [trash]: Install 1 card from HQ. Use this ability only during the next paid ability window after playing and resolving an operation.
stripped_printed_text: trash: Install 1 card from HQ. Use this ability only during the next paid ability window after playing and resolving an operation.

printed_text: Trash the unrezzed piece of ice the Runner is approaching: Choose a server other than the attacked server. The Runner moves to the outermost position of that server and encounters any ice there. Use this ability only once per turn.
stripped_printed_text: Trash the unrezzed piece of ice the Runner is approaching: Choose a server other than the attacked server. The Runner moves to the outermost position of that server and encounters any ice there. Use this ability only once per turn.

printed_text: Install only in the root of R&D. [click]: Reveal the top 3 cards of R&D. Secretly choose 1 to add to HQ. Return the others to the top of R&D, in any order. Limit 1 region per server.
stripped_printed_text: Install only in the root of R&D. click: Reveal the top 3 cards of R&D. Secretly choose 1 to add to HQ. Return the others to the top of R&D, in any order. Limit 1 region per server.

printed_text: Persistent → As an additional cost to steal an agenda from this server, the Runner must suffer 2 net damage. (If the Runner trashes this card while accessing it, this ability still applies for the remainder of this run.)
stripped_printed_text: Persistent -> As an additional cost to steal an agenda from this server, the Runner must suffer 2 net damage. (If the Runner trashes this card while accessing it, this ability still applies for the remainder of this run.)

flavor: "I'm sure there is no way this could go wrong for you." -Henry Phillips
printed_text:
When the Runner encounters Authenticator, he or she may take 1 tag to bypass it.
[subroutine] The Corp gains 2[credit].
[subroutine]End the run.
stripped_printed_text: When the Runner encounters Authenticator, he or she may take 1 tag to bypass it. Subroutine The Corp gains 2 credits. Subroutine End the run.

flavor: "Toying with them is where the job satisfaction comes in".
printed_text: Whenever the Runner breaks a subroutine during a run on this server, gain 2[credit] if he or she is tagged.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever the Runner breaks a subroutine during a run on this server, gain 2 credits if he or she is tagged.

flavor: "Our job is to stop incursions. Let Argus get cute with them." -Moishe Saban
printed_text:
[subroutine]End the run.
[subroutine]End the run.
stripped_printed_text: Subroutine End the run. Subroutine End the run.

printed_text:
Play only if there are at least 2 other cards in HQ.
Trash all cards from HQ. Place a total of 2 advancement counters on installed cards you can advance.
stripped_printed_text: Play only if there are at least 2 other cards in HQ. Trash all cards from HQ. Place a total of 2 advancement counters on installed cards you can advance.

printed_text:
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click], [click].
Move all advancement tokens from all installed cards to 1 card that can be advanced.
stripped_printed_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click, click. Move all advancement tokens from all installed cards to 1 card that can be advanced.

printed_text: [subroutine] Add 1 installed program to the top of the stack.
stripped_printed_text: Subroutine Add 1 installed program to the top of the stack.
